detailsData.title: No Win No Fee
detailsData.content: We’ll win your injury case, or it’s free. When we take your case, we expect to win because we fight to win.

detailsData.title: Real Experience
detailsData.content: We have the experience to handle your case from a quick settlement all the way to the courtroom.

detailsData.title: Communication
detailsData.content: Informed clients are happy clients and informed attorneys will do the best job for you.

detailsData.title: Client-Centered Approach
detailsData.content: Joe Zaid is known for his client-centered approach. He believes each case is unique and deserves personalized attention.

address: 4710 Vista Rd. Suite E Pasadena, TX 77505
subHeading: Best Houston Personal Injury Attorneys Committed to Your Case.
valueProp: Joe I. Zaid & Associates is committed to representing the rights of the injured both in Texas, and across the nation.

members.name: Melissa Guerra
members.position: Legal Assistant to Joe I. Zaid

testimonalData.text: I’m very glad I was recommended to Joe I. Zaid & Associates! My attorney I hired for a different case suggested I hire Mr. Zaid & Associates for my automobile accident, and I couldn’t thank him enough! They cater to every single need you may have.
testimonalData.author: Superfly Preston

testimonalData.text: Joe Zaid is an amazing attorney. Not only is he nice and professional, he is also very caring, patient and diligent in his work. He took the time to explain every step of the way with me and worked hard for me until reaching the best outcome for my case.
testimonalData.author: Francis Sanchez

testimonalData.text: It’s been a long year, but I gotta let y’all have it: Ms.Crystal and Mr.Lawrence Sims ate and left no crumbs. They called with detailed updates on everything. They explained the circumstances so clearly.
testimonalData.author: Esanti Tsedai
